resources.string: Greetings, human! Come to do battle with a troll again, eh? How spiffing. Choose your method of troll defeat!

So, you chose memes.
The good news: Trolls are weak towards memes.
The bad news: The troll is woefully out of touch. Proceed accordingly.
The Troll is browsing the internet, using Internet Explorer; they laugh, saying "Haha, that cat wants to haz cheezburger!" Your phone at the ready, hit him with your best meme.
In Soviet Russia, you defeat Troll! Here though, you die.
The troll proves the age old adage, "If your memes aren't funny, a troll will rip you limb from limb." Better luck next time!
The troll has laughed himself to death, improbably. Good job, memelord.
Hmmm, that didn\'t really jive, try again perchance?
You\'ve shown the Troll that meme before; He\'s not impressed
You don\'t get the feeling the troll found that terribly funny...
The Troll laughs, clearly appreciating your meme.
The Troll laughs and laughs, slapping it\'s knee. I guess you could call it a real...funny meme!
The Troll suddenly looks angry, and tells you to get back in your basement!
You chose \"Axe\". As in, the thing the Troll is most likely to kill you with. Okay Zoomer, let\'s see if you can end up dead here.

Each round, choose to either attack or defend; successfully defending means you take no damage, and deal a small amount of damage in return, while attacking obviously damages the Troll the most, but you could die very quickly.
Very well, human, a quest it shall be.\nAs you journey, you will gain keywords that will effect your choices; choose wisely!
